scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm run test && cd ../api && npm run test
scripts.check: cd frontend && npm run check && cd ../api && npm run check
scripts.check:fix: cd frontend && npm run check:fix && cd ../api && npm run check:fix
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npm run typecheck && cd ../api && npm run typecheck
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../api && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../api && npm run format
